document_data.mainbody:
Alathann Ruil was a fence of stolen goods inhabiting Waterdeep, City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Alathann operated out of a tavern called the Bloody Fist located in Waterdeeps Dock Ward on Presper Street. His point of contact within the Bloody Fist was a man named One-Eyed Jukk. Alathann kept his stolen merchandise, consisting primarily of arms and armor, at the Red Sails Warehouse on Cod Lane in the Dock Ward.
